messages: .@juventusfc are unbeaten in last 19 home #beINSerieA games.  Their last home loss came v. @sampdoria in January '13.  #JSL
.@inter are going through a bit of a #beINSerieA scoring drought - just 1GF in last 4 games w/just 2pts of 12 available.  #JSL
Most common score in this #beINSerieA Derby - 1-0 to @juventusfc [20x].  Biggest W was June '61 when #Juve beat @inter 9-1 in Turin.  #JSL
.@inter had largest #beINSerieA win over @juventusfc April '54 winning 6-0.  Since then they have never scored more than 4G v #Juve.  #JSL
RT @LittleLuluxox: @beINSPORTSUSA I mean, I don't want to brag but .. We really don't know what winter is here lol http://t.co/FXO6f8slxk
